job_description: Sustainability and Enviornmental, Social & Governance (ESG) Regional Lead Dell Technologies has a huge amount to say – on technology, on innovation, on business, on human progress and our Corporate Communications team makes sure those messages are heard. They are responsible for developing and driving global and regional communication strategies and delivering marketing services. Their expertise shapes the way Dell Technologies is seen – enhancing our reputation, brand and valuation on the global stage. Crucially, they enable us to build productive, positive and transformative relationships with colleagues, customers and the media. Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a Sustainability and Enviornmental, Social & Governance (ESG) Regional Lead on our Sustainability and ESG Customer and Regional Team in Hong Kong. What you’ll achieve The APJ/China Sustainability and ESG Lead role will be responsible for overseeing Dell’s Sustainability and ESG strategy for APJ/China, in partnership with Dell’s regional teams, including but not limited to Sales, regional product teams, Corporate Accounting and Statutory, Government Affairs, Corporate Affairs, Marketing and Communications. The position involves representing our global Sustainability & ESG strategy and priorities within the region; collaborating to establish and execute a region-specific Sustainability & ESG strategy and plan, working closely with internal business leaders as an extension of our global ESG operations and governance, which is a hub and spoke model; managing associated ESG regulatory requirements; and engaging with external stakeholders including customers, partners, and non-governmental organizations. You will: Establish and lead coordination, execution and accountability of region-specific Sustainability & ESG strategy, plan and priorities, in direct alignment with global strategy and plan Support and lead proactive management of customer and partner engagements, inquiries, and collaborations on Sustainability & ESG topics and priorities Oversee regional and country specific ESG reporting with an emphasis on understanding and aligning to regulatory requirements Identify and communicate regional and global ESG issues and the implications for Dell’s businesses and reputation to senior management Research and analyze regional and country specific ESG issues, and identify areas of potential reputational or business risk as well as opportunities Work within the CS & ESG team and our hub and spoke operating model to bring regional and country-level representation into the design and implementation of regional ESG initiatives that benefit Dell’s ESG goals, leadership positioning and impact Participate in external meetings with customers and other stakeholders to represent Dell’s Sustainability & ESG strategy, approach, and to share best practices Support Sales leaders in their efforts to build and maintain external relationships within a country by providing ESG-related strategic advice, talking points and background information, leveraging work done globally Be a value-added resource to senior management and business leaders to provide insight and guidance on ESG risks in the region and how to manage those risks Participate as an active member of the CS & ESG team to maintain close coordination and alignment on global ESG issues and priorities Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements Minimum 10+ years of experience in ESG (sustainability, corporate social responsibility) Strong understanding of ESG issues as they impact business and the technology sector Strong knowledge of technology products, services, and terminology Highly developed emotional intelligence and ability to influence others, including experience engaging senior business leaders Collaborative mindset, and ability to work with a wide range of internal partners Exceptional work ethic, with the ability to multi-task and work in a high-performance professional environment Excellent written and verbal communication skills Desirable Requirements: Bachelor’s degree required; advanced degree preferred Who we are: We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you. Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Join us to build a future that works for everyone because Progress Takes All of Us.
